WorkItem.ClosedComment: I've confirmed the Armory is on the fritz.  Make certain you can pull up your character in the Armory, and if Rawr still isn't pulling it up, let us know.
WorkItem.Description:
I had these 2 errors after updating to version 2.3.13:
 
Step Name: Get Item
Description: No item returned from Armory for 52572
 
Step Name: Get Character
Description: Rawr encountered an error retrieving the Character - Flamekorn@EU-Minahonda from the armory.
Add'l Info: Generating a Rawr Character
Object reference not set to an instance of an object.
   at Rawr.Character.RecalculateSetBonuses()
   at Rawr.Character..ctor(String name, String realm, CharacterRegion region, CharacterRace race, BossHandler boss, String head, String neck, String shoulders, String back, String chest, String shirt, String tabard, String wrist, String hands, String waist, String legs, String feet, String finger1, String finger2, String trinket1, String trinket2, String mainHand, String offHand, String ranged, String projectile, String projectileBag)
   at Rawr.Armory.GetCharacter(CharacterRegion region, String realm, String name, String[]& itemsOnCharacter)

Comments.Message:
Getting the same kind of error for characters on EU - emeral dream (characters emerlijn, eaglehunter, blackwidow) server: Get Item No Item returned from armory for 41248. Though perhaps it was an issue with new version. So downgraded back to 2.3.11 (didnt had had the 2.3.12 installer left on computer) but received same kind of msgs.

After that tried the new web edition but there it didnt work either. 2.3.13 had worked after first upgrade so perhaps its the "interface" from rawr to armory which has changed on the blizzard site.
Err... EU Armory is down for weekly maintenance.
Armory on maintenance ? Would explain why the program isnt working... only can get mine characters on the armory site still fine.
just tried "normal path" in stead of saved web link: getting error by accessing: http://eu.wowarmory.com/character-search.xml : File Not Found.. so the maintenace "could be" the reason yep.
